advancements.anshar.root.title: Anshar
advancements.anshar.root.description: What does Buoy o' light beam marks?
advancements.anshar.network_enter.title: Shiver me timbers! It be endless starry sea!
advancements.anshar.network_enter.descri: Use yer Buoy o' light to stamp yourself within th' cosmos
advancements.anshar.network_jump.title: Quick voyage
advancements.anshar.network_jump.descrip: Travel from one Pier o' Stars to another
anshar.help.transport.gate: Push on [%s] to sail th' Pier o' Stars
anshar.help.transport.exit: Stab [%s] to hop off th' Sea o' Void
anshar.tooltip.end_crystal.linked: Snoopin' ta Buoy o' light over landmark: %d %d %d
